page.title: 13My house
page.content: {A description of just one house that {was sold during 1985: It is on South Green, built sideways on to the road and the gales.It was 2 thatched cottages, now 1 tiled house. It has 3 bedrooms,1 kitchen,1 utility room,1 dining room,1 lounge,1 bathroom/lavatory,1 study or fourth bedroom,1 shower room/lavatory. All the rooms are large,e.g. the lounge is 27 feet long, and the smallest bedroom is 13*12 feet.The house is only 1 room wide but 100 feet long.It is built along one side of the garden with South Green at one end and the farm track at the other end overlooking the fields.It is over 120 years old.In 1985 it was sold for Â£47,950. It is possible to by newer houses and bungalows in Coates and Eastrea for Â£22,000 for 3 bedroom semi & det..
